message: I'm using Django REST Framework in a simple application. When using the webbrowser to view the API or a model with a ManyToManyField I see the standard django admin select multiple; however, when I post I get a TypeError because the CreateModelMixin is not doing anything special with the ManyToManyField.
Has anyone else successfully used this app with ManyToMany fields?
here is a cut down example which demonstrates the bug: http://dpaste.com/564980/
Found an existing pull request for what I want:
Cool, should go in shortly.  Btw, prob also worth mailing the group for stuff like this: http://groups.google.com/group/django-rest-framework
